DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate analgesic efficacy single intranasal ( IN ) administration ketorolac dental impaction surgery .
DOC.brief_title: A Single-dose Study Intranasal Ketorolac Treatment Pain Secondary Dental Impaction Surgery
DOC.criteria: Men woman , age 18 year old . Body weight > = 100 pound < = 300 pound . Women childbearing potential must negative serum pregnancy test result prior entry study . Able provide write informed consent . At least moderate pain determine PI score > = 50 mm 100mm VAS . Willing able comply test requirement define protocol . Willing able complete posttreatment visit . Immediately prior enter study , surgical removal 3 4 third molar ( least 1 mandibular partial bony complete bony impaction ) . Allergy sensitivity ketorolac EDTA . Allergic reaction aspirin NSAIDs . Current upper respiratory tract infection respiratory tract condition could interfere absorption nasal spray assessment adverse event ( AEs ) . Use IN product within 24 hour prior study entry . Clinically significant abnormality screen laboratory test . History cocaine use result nasal mucosal damage . Active peptic ulcer disease , recent ( define within 6 month ) history peptic ulcer disease gastrointestinal bleeding consider investigator clinically significant . Advanced renal impairment ( serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL ) risk renal failure due volume depletion . A history clinically significant medical problem , opinion investigator would interfere study participation . Participation within 30 day study entry within 5 time half life , whichever longer , another investigational drug study . Pregnancy breastfeed . Extraction teeth third molar surgical procedure ; exception : ( 1 ) supernumerary third molar ; ( 2 ) case whereby extraction third molar require removal adjacent molar . Previous participation study . Use shortacting NSAID ( aspirin ibuprofen ) acetaminophen within 12 hour surgery . Use longeracting NSAIDs ( naproxen sodium ) within 48 hour surgery piroxicam within 7 day surgery . Use steroid ( oral contraceptive ) within 72 hour surgery . Use moodaltering drug , cannabis alcohol , within 12 hour surgery . Surgical anesthesia include narcotic agent except fentanyl . Shortacting anesthetic , DEA schedule unscheduled , allow . Naloxone form permit . Use medication within 24 hour prior surgery , opinion investigator , could confound subject 's efficacy assessment ( eg , sedative , tranquilizer , MAO inhibitor , phenothiazine ) . Consumption caffeinecontaining product within 4 hour surgery .
